languages.text: "Наши ребята, бедолаги... с ними бы проститься по-человечески... а то лежат тут..." {n}Камиль отводит взгляд от тел.{/n}
"Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Наши ребята, бедолаги... с ними бы проститься по-человечески... а то лежат тут..." {n}Камиль отводит взгляд от тел.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}
"Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}
"Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

"Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

languages.text: "Unsere armen Männer ... sie haben eine anständige letzte Ehre verdient ... Stattdessen liegen sie hier so herum ..." {n}Camille wendet den Blick von den Leichen ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Unsere armen Männer ... sie haben eine anständige letzte Ehre verdient ... Stattdessen liegen sie hier so herum ..." {n}Camille wendet den Blick von den Leichen ab.{/n}

languages.text: « Nos pauvres gars... ils méritent les derniers honneurs... pas d'être abandonnés là comme ça... » {n}Camille détourne le regard des cadavres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nos pauvres gars... ils méritent les derniers honneurs... pas d'être abandonnés là comme ça... » {n}Camille détourne le regard des cadavres.{/n}

languages.text: “我这些可怜的战友……他们本该得到最后的荣耀……不该像这样躺在这里……”{n}科米尔从尸体上移开了目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我这些可怜的战友……他们本该得到最后的荣耀……不该像这样躺在这里……”{n}科米尔从尸体上移开了目光。{/n}

languages.text: 「若いのに可哀想に…最後の名誉は、ちゃんと報われるべきだ…こんな風にここで転がっているなんて…」{n}カミーユは死体から顔をそらす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「若いのに可哀想に…最後の名誉は、ちゃんと報われるべきだ…こんな風にここで転がっているなんて…」{n}カミーユは死体から顔をそらす。{/n}

languages.text: «Nuestros pobres muchachos... merecen unos últimos honores en condiciones... no estar aquí tirados así...». {n}Camille aparta la mirada de los cuerpos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros pobres muchachos... merecen unos últimos honores en condiciones... no estar aquí tirados así...». {n}Camille aparta la mirada de los cuerpos.{/n}

languages.text: "Zavallılar. Münasip bir cenaze törenini hak ediyorlar. Naaşları böyle kalmamalı." {n}Camille, gözlerini cesetlerden kaçırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our poor lads... they deserve proper last honours... not to be lying here like this..." {n}Camille looks away from the bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Zavallılar. Münasip bir cenaze törenini hak ediyorlar. Naaşları böyle kalmamalı. {n}Camille, gözlerini cesetlerden kaçırıyor.{/n}
